divs: Sighting DetailsFirst noticed light when in mother-in-law's driveway. Appeared to be a light moving in a repetitious path on some kind of aircraft. The central light was yellowish, but it had a bright red cone of light around it, not unlike a laser light show. The red cone did not extend much past the yellowish light and circulated with it. It travelled east to west for a few minutes and then began to head north at which time the lights faded. I would chock it up to a helicopter with a searchlight, but is was too high up ( just under the clouds) and it's light was not circulating in a pattern consistent with a localized suspect search (we have police helicopters flying over our house all the time). I have never seen any aircraft with lights like I witnessed, nor circulating in the way that I saw, and we have many aircraft flying overhead or nearby.
Summary: circulating, yellowish light with red cone
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There was one other sighting in Huntington Beach on or around February 18th 2012
